document_data.name: Alley Plague
document_data.mainbody: The '''Alley Plague''' was a [[disease]] outbreak that struck the [[Shoon Imperium]] in the {{YearlinkName|39}}.
document_data.Acquisition: The plague was spread through the air, especially in the vicinity of corpses of its victims.
document_data.Effects: The disease entailed pox and impaired the blood's ability to clot.
document_data.History: The Alley Plague ravaged [[Almraiven]] and [[Calimport]] as well as the docks of [[Manshaka]]. In most cities, casualties climbed to 17%, while in Calimport, casualties rose to 21%, owing to the accumulation of rotting corpses in the streets of Upper Calimport.
